name: Drop The Timeline
description:
[Submission for Brackeys Jam 2020.2]

Travel back to the present by traversing floating objects without falling into the void. The portal is only stable for so long, take too long and you will crash into the planet! 

Rewind the platforms to make them easier to navigate!

Use your Grappling Hook to save yourself from falling too far!

Collect powerups to help you reach the end!

Controls

  • Mouse to Look
  • WASD to Move
  • E to Rewind Highlighted Object
  • Hold F to Grapple
